ygData.subject: Re: How do you use the lull song and Star Wars.
ygData.msgSnippet: Shuriken s The Dwarf chick upstairs in the bank in Kaladim has them, and so does a vendor in the eastern commonlands, not sure which one though, havent been up
ygData.messageBody:
Shuriken's
The Dwarf chick upstairs in the bank in Kaladim has them, and so does a
vendor in the eastern commonlands, not sure which one though, havent been up
there ina while
-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim <kim@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, May 21, 1999 12:26 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] How do you use the lull song and Star Wars.


>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
>On Thu, 20 May 1999, Dennis Crews wrote:
>
>> Something I'll do is keep some throwing daggers on me. You
>> can chuck one at your target from just outside his bubble,
>> that gives you a bit extra time to swap weapons. The cost
>> of daggers really isn't that high compared to the loot you
>> can get.
>
>Shurikens have a greater range and cost the same. They do one
>less damage but the damage from throwing weapons is close to
>negligible. They also have a faster recycle time which means
>you don't have to wait as long if you get that annoying "you
>are too close to use a melee weapon" or "that target is out of
>range" message but still "uses" the weapon in terms of the
>delay (please everyone, /bug this :-).
>
>Where do you find shurikens? The monk guild has them, but
>there are only two of them in all Norrath. There is another
>guild that carries them, but I'll leave it up to you to figure
>out which one it is. :-)
>
>Another alternative to throwing weapons is to start your
>bellow on the mob, and while the song is "powering up" switch
>to your weapons.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
>
